field.name: summary
field.value: Monorail download (Castle.MonoRail-2.0.0.zip) appears to be corrupt

field.name: description
field.value:
Sorry if this is the wrong place to put this. I have never used Monorail before and cannot seem to extract the files from the zip file (Castle.MonoRail-2.0.0.zip). I get a message saying the zip is invalid or corrupted. I have tried this on three different PCs and get the same result each time. I can download and unzip other Castle projects without problem (like nVelocity).
Can someone please look into this?
Thanks Tommy

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text:
Hi Michael,
We've had this problem reported before and I'm not sure why this happens. Anyway, can you please try to unzip the zip file using 7-zip. You can d/l from http://www.7-zip.org/
Also, for future questions please use the users group - http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-users
I'm closing this issue.
Cheers John

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text:
That's a known issue with .zips from Sourceforge.
Usually 7-zip handles them just fine.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: Maybe I should upload a new zip!

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: Uploaded new zip file, zipped using WinZip v11.1. Hope this helps,

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Won't Fix''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''2.0''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
